name: Viruses A(re)Live
description:
Avoid pills and keep reproducing! So that you will always be alive!

In progressing  levels you will get more pills to avoid and more cells to duplicate. In the contact with pills you blow up, and when you get your DNAs on other cells you gain allies. 

Since viruses are not really alive they only floats but when a pill detects a virus it gets activated and start going after the viruses. 

When no virus left on the petri plate you should go over that level again, if no cells left you proceed to next level.

Developed with Unity,

Inspired from "Blockbuster!" mobile game,

Other than sound and 2D art, creation of rest belongs to me.
